cab.content: 210SECRET.OPERATIONS.Prom:- General Plumer., Italy, To:- C .I.G.S, War Office,Handed in 0.20 p*m0 2nd. Dec. 1917c Received 9,30 pom0 2nd Dec. 1917*0 76.There was some sharp - local fighting yesterday around Mount Perimono with alternating results P In other sectors no changeeCur troops are taking over sectors of Montello without incident so far. Have seen Diaz this morning and. ho is very pleased with the assistance already given by our taking over part of the line, 1 have promised to take over another sector as soon as the other divisions arrive which I said would bo by about Dec 15 th..
